about_the_game:
IMPORTANT This game was born as a joke for Sirenkahls, a weird Australian streamer. There are references not everyone will get.

"In this spine-chilling adventure, you will delve into the eerie world of a cult that worships a sinister deity through the creation and consumption of blasphemous cheesecakes. As the protagonist, you must navigate through a nightmarish maze of secrets, rituals, and unspeakable horrors to unravel the truth and escape with your sanity intact. Did I mention you are being followed by the cult leader?"

content_descriptors.notes: There are multiple jump-scares and tense horror moments in almost every level.

detailed_description:
IMPORTANT This game was born as a joke for Sirenkahls, a weird Australian streamer. There are references not everyone will get.

"In this spine-chilling adventure, you will delve into the eerie world of a cult that worships a sinister deity through the creation and consumption of blasphemous cheesecakes. As the protagonist, you must navigate through a nightmarish maze of secrets, rituals, and unspeakable horrors to unravel the truth and escape with your sanity intact. Did I mention you are being followed by the cult leader?"
name: Cheesecake Cult: Unholy Feast

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 6th Gen i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is using hardware raytracing, hence the need for a graphics card that supports that.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 6th Gen i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is using hardware raytracing, hence the need for a graphics card that supports that.

short_description: This game was born as a joke for Sirenkahls, a weird Australian streamer.
